以下示例：
至少选择3天，至多选择10天
HTML Code
{{!text1}}  
<mx-calendar.rangepicker class="w240"
    start="{{=start}}"
    end="{{=end}}"
    shortkeys="{{@shortkeys}}"/>
JS Code
{{!text2}}  
let Magix = require('magix');
let Moment = require('moment');
let $ = require('$');
let Formater = 'YYYY-MM-DD';

module.exports = Magix.View.extend({
    tmpl: '@index.html',
    render() {
        let start = Moment().format(Formater),
            end = Moment().add(5, 'days').format(Formater);
        let shortkeys = [{
            key: 'test1',
            text: '自定义1',
            tip: '自定义说明1',
            start,
            end
        },{
            key: 'test2',
            text: '自定义2',
            tip: '自定义说明2',
            start: start,
            end: Moment().add(10, 'days').format(Formater)
        }]
        this.updater.digest({
            start,
            end,
            shortkeys
        });
    }
});
